name: pshegger
body:
## About me
My name is Gergely Hegedüs and this is a short website about me and my work for those who are interested in it. Currently I live in Budapest, Hungary and work as an Android Developer at [Tappointment](https://www.tappointment.com/web/login.php).

In my free time I like to play video games or hang out with my friends, but my biggest passion is Kung Fu what I try to practice as much as possible. I also like to make cool things be it a usefull tool or a game.

## Personal Projects
Every time I see something cool on the Internet my imagination starts to fly, and sometimes it ends up as something new and (hopefully) great which in time will make its way here.

## Contact
Feel free to contact me if you have any kind of question/suggestion or just want to have a nice chat with me.
* Email: <pshegger@gmail.com>
* Twitter: [@pshegger](https://twitter.com/pshegger)
* Facebook: [Gergely Hegedüs](https://www.facebook.com/gergely.hegedus)
* Github @PsHegger
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
